Detailed Description

Listener used inside the Alaris bot to get and handle ACS responses.

void Alaris.Core.ClientListener.Dispose (  ) 

Releases all resource used by the Alaris.Core.ClientListener object.

Call Dispose when you are finished using the Alaris.Core.ClientListener. The Dispose method leaves the Alaris.Core.ClientListener in an unusable state. After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the Alaris.Core.ClientListener so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the Alaris.Core.ClientListener was occupying.
